Key Match Events: WICKET! Wood b Bumrah 0 England 129 all out -India win by 100 runs
Pre-Game Insights: England restrict India before Bumrah sends them crumbling to 100-run defeat
Post-Match Reflections: England’s problems are easily identifiable & clear - selection, motivation, form, batting, bowling, fielding & no travelling reserves
It hurts and it should hurt. Again, they’ve not competed for 100 overs of a game.
To put it into context, that was England’s second best performance of the tournament so far…
England’s last four innings totals have been: 215, 170, 156, 129
Miscellaneous Highlights: England lost five of six matches
India have now won every game
Kuldeep Yadav takes 49 runs in 8 overs
Others: The game was a good challenge for India, they practise in the evening so the dew wasn’t a surprise. The guys get on, they’re enjoying the tournament, Shami is a gem, and they haven’t lost a game.
